Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Triage® Protein C Test, a point-of-care fluorescence immunoassay for quantitative determination of Protein C in citrated blood or plasma using Triage Meter.
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid, quantitative determination of Protein C in citrated whole blood or plasma specimens from patients with signs and symptoms of sepsis; not intended for use in patients with vitamin K deficiency, DIC, cancers, HIV, and liver or renal disease.
